alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued November 16 at 2:04PM EST until November 18 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 to 31 possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast North Carolina and northeast South Carolina. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender; Robeson
